QuestData.Title: The Dark Within
QuestData.Description: The light... has gone out. I know not why.$B$BI am more troubled now than before. I can find little comfort in the everyday. Each day seems darker than the last.$B$BPlease, bring me another one of the Sun Crystals. Its light is so warm, so comforting.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Sun Crystal in Skyreach.
